advice.en: This is a life-threatening neurotoxic snake bite caused by snakes like cobra, krait, coral snake, and sea snake. Neurotoxic venom affects nerves and muscles and can slowly stop breathing. Keep the patient calm and completely still. Do not allow walking or running. Immobilize the bitten limb and keep it below heart level. Remove rings, bangles, anklets, or tight clothing. Watch for drooping eyelids, blurred vision, slurred speech, difficulty swallowing, or breathing trouble. Do NOT cut, suck, massage, or apply tourniquet. Do NOT apply ice, turmeric, oil, herbs, or chemicals. Do NOT give alcohol or home remedies. Take the patient immediately to the nearest hospital. Antivenom is the only effective treatment. Hospital observation for at least 24 hours is mandatory even if symptoms are mild.
advice.hi: यह जानलेवा न्यूरोटॉक्सिक सांप का काटना है। मरीज को शांत और स्थिर रखें और तुरंत अस्पताल ले जाएं। एंटीवेनम ही इलाज है।

advice.en: This is a hemotoxic snake bite caused by vipers. The venom damages blood, tissues, and kidneys. Immediate hospital treatment is required.
